scripts.say: Guess we never stood a chance...
Oh, blast it...
They did it again! They used the teleport command!
And they did so at the last possible moment... Is this some sort of automatic safety feature the server has?
Hrm... I know they're just clones the Sirens made, but it's still hard to get myself to fight them.
That said, I might be able to go all out if always get teleported away right before their HP hits 0. I'm not about to let an imposter beat me.
Hmh, as someone once said: a faker will never be anything more than a faker...
But it's annoying that we can't reduce their numbers. They'll wear us down over time if they simply retreat, heal, and come back to fight us again.
We need only take out their stronghold before it comes to that.
(Sora seems a lot more resolute than she was yesterday... That's reassuring.)
I'm done being hesitant. From now on, my mind is set: we'll put a stop to the Sirens' schemes and end this whole ordeal.
I'm getting fed up with fighting all these clones...
I understand. Fighting clones of yourself is one thing, but it's rather distressing to fight those of your close friends.
The Sirens have always played dirty like that. Once we get back, Purity's getting an earful from me!
From me too...
I can hear you, ya know!
Whuah?! Why are you contacting us all of a sudden, Purity?
Zed, how is it going on your end?
We walked into an ambush, but we dealt with the Sirens and were just going to resume our search. What about the base, everything fine there?
The base is functioning as normal.
While the base is fine, there's this black veil that suddenly appeared out of nowhere! I think it's expanding, and coming from the labyrinth, actually...
What?!
Look up, everyone!
Just as Javelin said, there's a veil floating in the air above the labyrinth.
Or rather, it's in the sky. It spans across the ocean, enveloping everything in its path.
That's not a veil, it's a barrier! And unbelievably strong one, at that! I hit it with everything I have, yet it didn't as much as cut a hole into it!
This is obviously an impassable wall the GM made that we can't pass through without permission...
We can't go forward like this...
It seems we have no choice but to fall back for the time being...
Say, if we can't go by air or by sea...
Then I might have a good solution to the problem...
